# DRLm <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" alt="" width="120" />

The `DRLm` package is a collection of dose-response functions  for `qraLm` package.

## Installation

You can install the `DRLm` development version from [GitHub: https://github.com/vcadavez/DRLm](https://github.com/vcadavez/DRLm) using the `devtools` package:



```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("vcadavez/DRLm")
```
